tools.name: search_documents
tools.description: Search through documents using semantic similarity. Use this when you need to find relevant information from stored documents based on a query.

query.description: The search query to find relevant documents

use_hybrid.description: Use hybrid search combining vector and keyword search (default: true)

tools.name: get_document
tools.description: Retrieve a specific document by its ID. Use this when you know the exact document you need.

doc_id.description: The unique identifier of the document

tools.name: list_documents
tools.description: List all available documents in the vector store. Use this to see what documents are available.

limit.description: Maximum number of documents to return (default: 10)
